channel.title: +1 Forward - Briar & Bramble
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/briar-bramble
​Rach brings on Freddie Taylor-Bell to talk about their game about a community of wayward animals in search of a new home - ***Briar & Bramble***
Timecodes: 0:01:16 - Read a Sitch about the ease of transition from player to designer with PbtA games 0:06:28 - Open Your Brain to Briar and Bramble 0:15:00 - Act Under Fire with Rach as Clair the raccoon!
Find the Briar and Bramble on Itch here: https://drunkwizard.itch.io/briar
